paddyhoran commented on issue #2520: ARROW-3173: [Rust] dynamic_types example does not run
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2520#issuecomment-419637905
 
 
   That's bizarre, yesterday there were Go failures.  It was the `go get -t -v ./..` that was failing I believe, it mentioned something about a path issue with `/math`.  Sorry if that's vague I can't quite remember and I'm unfamiliar with Go.  @wesm did you see the failure also?
   
   In any case, I guess it's all good now.
